ic.overview.title: Velkommen!
ic.overview.summary: I denne app har du du adgang til de opgaver og øvelser, som du skal udføre som en del af WristAngel-studiet.
ic.overview.content:
Velkommen til WristAngel studiet.

I denne app har du du adgang til opgaverne og øvelserne som du skal udføre som en del af WristAngel-studiet. Inden vi begynder, vil vi fortælle dig om appen og din deltagelse. Hvis du er under 18, skal du gennemgå dette med dine forældre.
ic.who.title: Hem er vi?
ic.who.summary:
This study is conducted by researchers and clinicians from the Child and Adolescent Mental Health Center, Capital Region of Denmark and the Technical University of Denmark.

The main contact person is clinical psychologist Nicole Lønfeldt.
ic.who.content:
This research is done in collaboration between the Child and Adolescent Mental Health Center, Research Unit, Capital Region of Denmark and the Copenhagen Center for Health Technology (CACHET) at the Technical University of Denmark (DTU).

The investigators directly working with this study include: 
 - Professor Anne Katrine Pagsberg and Senior Scientist Nicole Lønfeldt from the research unit of the Child and Adolescent Mental Health Center
 - Professor Line Clemmensen and Postdoc Sneha Das from the DTU Compute
 - Professor Jakob E. Bardram and PhD student Giovanna Nunes Vilaza from DTU HealthTech

This study is funded by the Novo Nordisk Foundation’s Exploratory Interdisciplinary Synergy Program. The grant reference number is NNF19OC0056795. The investigators have no financial connection to funders.
ic.tasks.title: Hvad skal du gøre?
ic.duration.title: Hvornår kan du se dine svar?
ic.data.title: Hvad sker der med dine data?

ic.summary.title: Opsummering
ic.summary.summary:
You are above 18 years old. If you are not, please go through this with your parent. 

You have read and understood the provided information and have had the opportunity to ask questions.
ic.summary.content:
You are above 18 years old. If you are not, please go through this with your parent. 

You have read and understood the provided information and have had the opportunity to ask questions.

You understand your rights: your participation is voluntary, and you are free to withdraw at any time.

You understand and agree with how your data is collected, stored and used.
ic.review.title: Informeret samtykke
ic.review.reason: Have you read, understood and agreed with using this app for the study as explained?
ic.completion.title: Tak!
ic.completion.text: Vi har nu gemt dit samtykke.
